message.body: hellllloooo
u busy workin?
sorta
suppose to beeeee
yeaaa, same here...but the parents/bosses are outta town, so everyone's kinda takin an easy week.
I've been here at the office all day by myself...it's glorious
thought of you last night when I was up until 3am.
that makes sense...hehe
I prolly wouldda stayed up longer if I didn't have to be out the door by 6:45.
Then we had this really unsettling discussion in class about how all men have really always wanted sumbissive, subservient women, and that will likely never change. it was awesome
ha, I just realized that Im not attracted to women that like me
that's an issue, isn't it?
I have that problem too
except with men, obviously.
I think I'm close to growing out of tht though
I actually just threw the towel in this morning on a guy that's been giving me the run a round, b/c I realized that the chase is not where it's at.
well congrats
yeah I guess. I'm alone again, way to go me!
the chase is ok, I mean it can be entertaining and all
Its funny because ive been trying to figure out for the past few days how to throw in the towel w/ this girl
correct me if I'm wrong, but she's the one chasing you....in my case, I was the one chasing him...
haha...I pulled a Larah
not sure if that makes a difference.
what do you mean by that?
left gchat
ah. I do that? what's the last thing you got?
im good. yeah shes chasing me, thats the problem
so I can advise you how to get her to throw in the towel, based on what this guy did to me, lol
sure, but Ive got to get the kids. be back in a few
just say maybe to everything, or ignore her.
see ya
yeah, im not sure I agree with your philosophy there
lol...it's not my philosphoy
philosophy
besides, thats pretty much what Ive done, and she just seems more interested
well, she has more persistence or less dignity than me...
lol
thats quite possible, or is more patient
right, there's that too.
ehhh nahhh
I think it's respectful to acknowledge someone's existance..
I mean, I certainly dont want someone who is going to ignore me
he used to call back/text back at least the same day. it's been 5 days. lol
I've left 2 messages, and sent 1 text....he shouldda called.
and he had been calling...not sure what happened
you never know
I find that honesty is best
though I also find that no one else does
me too, and yeah, he was seemingly on board with that tooo
but the bottom line is, if someone is genuinely interested they will make the time and get back to you
I just let him know that I can't keep chasing him down, not b/c I don't wanna see him tho.
I agree.
ah, the takeaway
and he obviously hasn't, so he's not interested, and I can take that for what it is.
one of my fav's
the "take away?"
yup thats when you make yourself available and then retract
well, I'm not angry, I'm just not gonna do it anymore
the thing with the takeaway is it will sometimes get the other person interested again
whatever
I'm not going for that.
I mean the other way
so what are you gonna do about this chick that is totally in to you.
now you appear unavailable to him, or disinterested
when I see you again, if it comes up, we can chat about this...b/c the whole thing really confuses me. I'd be interested in your insight.
he may feel a slight rejection
sorry...phone call
in fact, what time do you work tomorrow?
i don't think he really gives a shit, to be honest, lol
brb
well predicting what he thinks hasnt worked out so well thus far
this is true
I'm not playing anything out in my head really, b/c anything I start to pay out I can't make sense of...
as far as work goes, Im more or less caught up so tomorrow si fairly open, just have a few things to finish up
I'm thinkin bout driving down tonight after work....maybe
not sure it's a good idea
you dont seem very sure of anything right now
which is why I'm a little afraid to see you
of all people
is it as miserable there as it is here?
lol...not sure I want to be picked apart
it's not miserable
I'm not miserable
oh yes it's raining
weather wise
i dont pick apart....
mcuh
much
plus I'm kinda lonely and I think maybe I should face that
regarding the dude, I think what you're dealing with is a mild form of rejection
Most people don't deal w/ rejection well. Especially if they aren't used to it
umm, maybe...but I think it's bigger than that.
bigger than just this guy
oh, hows that?
fyi, I have a client coming in any moment, and I'll have to go then...
k
ummm, too much/complex to type....sex robots, thoughts of 17th century men...
as far as a visit, Im am free tonight, so you are welcome to stop by. other than that I will only say do what feels right
fear of being rejected by all men...for not being feminine enough for their liking
yeah that def didnt clear it up, haha
ok, true but that is a symptom of rejection
ok, I can go with that.
even though he didnt reject you outright, it gets your brain thinking in that way. the what if's come up
I really don't konw why I was rejected though...honestly, can't think of why
thats the problem. You're not going to figure it out. It could be any of a thousand different variables
he made it seem like, and I felt like, everything was really good.. until it all changed one day...so I'd like to think it just wasn't right, period.

yeah, thats what I am afraid of w/ this girl. I feel like it 'seems' to be all good to her. But here I am being all weird trying to figure out how to let her down easy, even though I told her that I wasnt looking for a relationship
in the end, I end up doing nothing because it's easier. Its not really fair to her though
other than ignoring her, that is
Ha, so I guess what I am saying is....what is it you would like to hear from this guy as far as an explanation?
umm...well...
if I could konw everything, what his intentions were, and why he felt they weren't being fulfilled.
and follow up question. Would you rather he ignore you or tell you straight up?
I never once talked about a relationship...actually he brought that up.
straight up
he was always the one, like can I call you tomorrow, then he would. he has been pursuing me from day 1, until he stopped.
even if you might not like the answer?
why did he stop?
oh definitely
I can handle the truth
even if it's well, you're 10 lbs heavier than I like, or, your laugh annoys me, or you're clingy, whatever.
well, you could ask him, but you may not get the truth
I can't ask him b/c I can't even get ahold of him.
well, if/when you do
oh, yeah, I have no problem cornering people...I'm just not sure I care/ it matters
I could corner him at work
sometimes people just arent' compatible...or the timing isnt good
yikes
I agree, in general I would rather not make a big deal out of it.
we seemed compatible
it's just life. If someone doesnt like me for who I am, then thats cool. Id rather they move on than drag me along

but our zodiac compatibility said "These two are opposites in the zodiac and are attracted to each other like magnets. They are both tireless, changeable and not frank enough as lovers. Gemini are inclined to criticize the Sagittarius' behavior in bed. They may be disappointed sexually, since neither is demonstrative-and Gemini is very quick to criticize. There are also some other weak points in their relationships while the strength is that they are both undemanding people. Their affair will probably begin impulsively and will be finished suddenly as well. The marriage can turn out to be quite good but it will require efforts from both of them. "
and it was spot on with the magnet thing, and impulsive start
yeah, mean it's really ok...just gets my mind going a bit
Thats the problem with the magnetic/impulsive start thing
yeah, but I love that shit...
love intensity and passion.
I'd do it all again, lol
It gets you mind racing like crazy, and you have no idea what is going on, but you still think about the future. Like a future w/ the person, when really we're just gettin ahead of ourselves
of course, same here
I sometimes think I will never settle because I cant give it up
nah I just need a man that can keep doling i out
then other times, I feel like Im nuts and need to stop and settle down w/ someone that is good for me
there are ways to keep things exciting yet maintain stability.
perhaps, but you can't replace 'new'
"new" leads to empty...
I like old stuff.
it has character, dependability...
but its the newness of the relationship that makes it passionate
We aren't so different, you and I...
I'd rather have that than "new." I maintain there are ways to keep things exciting, even with the same person
to a point yes, and with the right person. A dynamic person. I haven't been able to find that thus far. I believe that maybe I will, but Im not sure
expand on "dynamic"
well someone that is complex, ever-changing, and engaging
someone that isn't going to bore you after a few weeks/months/years
gtg!
